scripts.start:all: npm --prefix activepieces run build:dev-pieces && concurrently -k -n BCGPT,AP_BACKEND,AP_UI "node index.js" "npm --prefix activepieces run dev:backend" "npm --prefix activepieces run serve:frontend"
scripts.ap:local:build: docker buildx build --platform linux/amd64 -t activepieces-bcgpt:local --load -f activepieces/Dockerfile activepieces
scripts.ap:local:up: docker compose -f docker-compose.activepieces.yml -f docker-compose.activepieces.local.yml --env-file .env.activepieces -p bcgpt-ap-local up -d --build
scripts.ap:local:logs: docker compose -f docker-compose.activepieces.yml -f docker-compose.activepieces.local.yml --env-file .env.activepieces -p bcgpt-ap-local logs -f activepieces
scripts.ap:local:down: docker compose -f docker-compose.activepieces.yml -f docker-compose.activepieces.local.yml --env-file .env.activepieces -p bcgpt-ap-local down
